startingPosition.instruction: Squat with the feet flat on the floor and feet shoulder distance apart. Knees bent and seperated. Buttocks above the heels. Palms on the knees.

technique.instruction: Take small steps in the squatting position keeping the knees flexed so that the buttocks are not moved away from the heels. Walk either on the toes or on the soles.
While taking a step forward, bring the opposite knee to the floor.
